lenders.loan_because: as a business person it allows me to contribute to someone in a way that I can understand.  I am hopeful that the contribution that is made by everyone to the particular individual builds confidence in their abilities and ensures their ability to prosper for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Gillian
lenders.loan_because: i love sharing money!! And my loving family gave me the money to help support other women around the world.

lenders.loan_because: it is a great thing to do and helps out those in need.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: we care about giving people chances to start fresh and help supporting those in need.

lenders.name: Dan & Karen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone could use a litle help.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: If not me, who?  We have 2 TVs, 2 computers, 3 bedrooms, and it's all airconditioned and easily paid for...what do they have?

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It is a way I can contribute to the World Community from my own home
lenders.occupational_info: The work I do is intended to better myself and to enable the same for other people. I teach literacy, I teach cultural safety, I never stop learning, I hope I'm an inspiration to my grandchildren!

lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do when we have so much in Ontario, Canada
lenders.occupational_info: I work with youth by providing employment opportunities that support the environment

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: NovaGod
lenders.loan_because:
It makes us as a corporation feel as if we are doing something good for others & not just sitting here playing games on the PC, We should think ourselves lucky to even have one nor have the time to sit down & play around.

We are a group of people from around the world that raise money to loan to kiva by playing a game.

We play a game called EVE, It is a space based game where you fly around in your ship mining doing missions or just going around attacking other players. Very in depth game play with a huge market of items to trade & corporate share markets

With the extra game money made in game that the corp does not need is then traded & sold to other players & then the real money is formed from the games play money & sent to kiva as a loan. 
Once the loan is paid off the money then go's back to the shareholders of the corp & paid back as dividends. & round & round it go's.

So where not only just playing a game but at the same time helping change lives around the world.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I feel very privliaged in my life and what I have. I think by giving someone else a chance they can feel that too.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the city taking care of a public park doing things like weeding, mowing the lawn, and general labor.

lenders.name: Eric & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: We are touched and inspired by these individuals working so hard to make a better life for their families

lenders.name: stephen
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to see how a small amount of money can change the lives of so many

lenders.name: Gwen
lenders.loan_because: I believe small loans are a more direct way to get involved.
lenders.occupational_info: Rebuilding public universities - brick by brick

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone develop a business without the interference of governments.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a funeral home as a pre-need manager.

lenders.name: Mary & Sam
lenders.loan_because: Anyone genuinely working toward self reliance by running their own business is admirable, and if I can help a little then I am glad.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.occupational_info: building homes and installing power and phone lines

Helping someone be able to smile is priceless. We all need help sometimes.

Contributing also allows me to bless others as I have been blessed.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with victims of crime and is politically active in fighting for womens rights on a local and national level, My work is based on helping/supporting my fellow members of society in becoming the best they can be.

May God bless all of them and all of you as well.
Thanks

lenders.name: Omtara1008

If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap.

If you want happiness for a lifetime, help others.
                                          ~ Chinese proverb

lenders.name: Bekah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make others' lives more abundant and healthy.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently graduated from college, got married, and am now working as a freelance make-up artist.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to better them selves and their family. Along with making them feel good about who they are and what they have accomplished. On a selfish level it also makes me feel good to give someone that opportunity in life.

lenders.name: Ugo
lenders.loan_because: words are cheap... and so is Kiva. But Kiva can make the difference in somebody's life. And that's enough for me.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.occupational_info: Lake Winnipesaukee, New Hampshire

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: I was born/raised in Liberia, West Africa My parents picked up and moved there as young, new doctors - lived there for almost 25 years.  As a young child, I grew up seeing poverty and disease but just as equally , experienced a life of simplicity and happiness. I loan because I believe the world can only survive if we extend unconditional kindness to others.  Every human being in this world can contribute, however small it is, to the solution of another person's problem
lenders.occupational_info: As a nurse I work in a hospital and take care of patients with a history of heart problems.  I also work as a school nurse taking care of students with disabilities, illnesses, social problems, etc. I find my job very rewarding and feel blessed to be able to help others.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: it's rarely this easy to have an impact

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: It could easily be me in this kind of situation and I'm eternally grateful for my blessings and good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: As a psychotherapist I assist people to live their lives more fully by helping them come to know who they are, heal their own hurts, and realise their own individual gifts.

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: Economic progress is a decentralized process of discovery. It depends on imagination and talents of individuals, who respond to ever changing conditions and preferences. Supporting these folks directly make much sense.

lenders.name: Angry Dad
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism is cool.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I am a believer in micro credit and feel this method is best suited to address the needs of those in developing economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying International Business at the University of Georgia and am emphasizing in finance.

lenders.name: Dierdre
lenders.loan_because: it's a privilege to be able to loan, and I'm inspired by the beautiful and brave stories.

lenders.name: Harlene
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent my working life as a school counselor working with children 5 - 18.

lenders.name: Murty
lenders.occupational_info: I am a marketing executive at a Silicon Valley company. I started this company in 2006 to develop products for mobile phones.

lenders.name: Parthav
lenders.loan_because: There is an abundance of wealth in the First World... there is no need to horde it.

lenders.name: Shauna and Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: We serve food in a fancy Chinese Restaurant.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Nancy Ann  & Baldev Raj
lenders.loan_because: Kiva loans are an excellent way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: As a returned Peace Corps volunteer I know how much it means to enterprising people who have no access to funds for start-up and improvements to their businesses. Plus, my current loan is to a group in the area where I served as a volunteer!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a small college and provide health care to the students.

lenders.name: Laura & Brad
lenders.loan_because: it makes us feel good :)

lenders.name: Cesar
lenders.loan_because: I believe in cooperation.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I am continually seeking ways to help others. I thought I would give kiva.org a try.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an insurance agent. I help others manage risk in their lives.

lenders.name: Boyd
lenders.loan_because:
Delray Beach, Florida
Sharing makes one's life whole.

lenders.name: Jean Prouvaire
lenders.loan_because: it's a way of most directly getting money to self-motivated people who need it, and the peer-to-peer principles underlying microfinancing are intriguing.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it feels right!

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: My wife Stacey and I recently got married and one of our most precious gifts, a Kiva gift certificate was given to us by our friend Andy.  We feel very fortunate about the lives we live. Our hope is that this gift will enable others to pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a video editor which means I take raw footage and piece it together to make half-hour or one hour shows for television.  My wife Stacey is a writer and producer for television which means she develops stories and concepts for broadcast.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Microlending/Microenterprise is a great idea, and an easy way for anyone to make a big difference over a great distance.
lenders.occupational_info: Bringing people and resources together to fight poverty.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to give. By choosing a real person, I get a true sense of making a difference to an individual and their family. And I get to experience that yes, one person really can make a difference in our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses promote themselves. I find the best words to help them get their message across to their prospective customers. It could be for their website, a letter, a newsletter, a brochure or an advertisement.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: This is a great idea, and I want to help others with future success.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on military aircraft for the United States Navy, I repair the electrical systems responsible for flight and navigation, along with weapons and communication systems.

lenders.name: Paola
lenders.loan_because: I am much more fortunate than others.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: it was a gift I recieved at Christmas
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home and care for my three children, ages 1, 3, and 6.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: It's a joy.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software instructions for a living.  My time is full of family and work and creative living.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software and manage the infrastructure that support large corporate databases.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: It matters
lenders.occupational_info: I like to build, put together complex machines from simple pieces.  All problems are best solved by taking the first step.

lenders.name: Penguin Knight
lenders.loan_because: My grandma managed to have run a clothes store by collecting scrap fabrics from different people. I believe this small loan idea is viable and meaningful.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes all it takes is a few steps to reach the top of a mountain
lenders.occupational_info: Provide travel experiences for fun and advancement of the knowledge of cultures

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to succeed.

lenders.name: jeff
lenders.occupational_info: Hoping for the best ...

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: It is one way I can help those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, where I arrange all the papers that the physicians and nurses use.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a helping hand.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: When we as a society cease to help each other, humanity is diminished.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I'm lucky enough to be able to help others.  It's wonderful to have the opportunity to so easily make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a nonprofit organization.

lenders.name: Tinuviel
lenders.loan_because: Jesus would.
lenders.occupational_info: Housecleaning and organizing. I am in college studying economics, too.

lenders.name: Terry-Jo
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: fast paced, demanding, challenging and fun

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: It's a blessing to help others

lenders.name: Lorrie
lenders.loan_because: I believe small business is sustainable, has a greater positive impact on a community and a smaller destructive footprint than large business. If you give a fisherman a fishing pole, he'll feed his village.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze web sites and track their traffic, visits, visitors and other conversion metrics that can make a web site sucessful.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: "Success is where preparation and opportunity meet." - Bobby Unser
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and manage computers at a rural school.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: by the grace of God, lots of hard work, and the generosity of others, I have enough to support myself and live my dreams.  Now it's my turn to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an oncology nurse in an outpatient clinic.  I love what I do and find it very rewarding!

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I didn't realize that for the cost of one take away meal, I was able to assist someone who like me has family, friends, dreams and aspirations.

lenders.name: Designing Dreams
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping others make their dreams come true, as others are helping make our dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a non-profit organization that teaches youth (ages 8 -15) entrepreneurial skills with hands-on instruction in making high quality leather designs.

lenders.name: Vanessa and Fabio
lenders.loan_because: The good you do to  others is the same you do to yourself.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I always wanted to help the poor and I finally have a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Since I'm a kid I go to school and do chores to help my family.

lenders.name: Marla
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by people that are entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I farm 2500 acres in Canada. Farming involves taking risks because there are many factors that a person has no control over such as the weather and the price you will recieve for your product.

lenders.name: Gena
lenders.loan_because: What a way to see the world!

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy and fun way to help people and I know that the money actually gets where it is supposed to go.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide academic advice to students at my university and help them solve problems when they come up.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business and it is extremely challenging to get started without a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make the best use of their financial resources.

lenders.name: tim & alison
lenders.loan_because: we believe that people who "have" should share with those who do not. everyone should be given an opportunity to better their life and community.
lenders.occupational_info: tim is a studying sociology at the university of washington. alison works for a research company building lasers.

lenders.name: Juli
lenders.loan_because: we're here to help each other and share our good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I work from my home on the computer, doing information research and data compiling and entry.  I also transcribe medical research manuscripts.  And I care for my elderly mother, with whom I live.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
Why? The Sermon on the Mount, sir.
- Kenneth Whistler
(via Kurt Vonnegut)

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: Programming websites and databases

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed at whatever they choose. 
I have been helped in the past. And now I wish to pass on a little assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people overcome their fears. Not just in speaking in public, but in being themselves.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see a better world for all grandchildren.
lenders.occupational_info: I build systems to pump drinking water, irrigation water and sewage.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I have had lots of friends from other countries.  I want to help in ways my loans can do the most good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with doctors and nurses providing information about clinical tests and help in getting the results, answers about tests

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make some small positive difference in the lives of ordinary people like myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I turn students on the the wonder that comes from understanding the Earth.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to know you can make a difference in someone elses life.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I've been graciously helped when I was in need and this appeals to me so I can do the same to some degree.
lenders.occupational_info: Design materials to help businesses sell their services through print, web, photography or video.

lenders.name: Shoker
lenders.loan_because: I  love to help people it makes me happy
lenders.occupational_info: SIKH   from   PUNJAB ,   INDIA.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others. Life is short and I have not been helpful enough in my time on earth so far.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a store that sells computers

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.occupational_info: I provide tax advice and planning to individuals and businesses.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: because I like to help people succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a university planning conferences and managing events.

lenders.name: Dcengr
lenders.loan_because: Interest rate on savings are 0% anyways . Might as well get some karma interest.
lenders.occupational_info: Trade equities, commodities, etc

lenders.name: Kiran
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Karina
lenders.loan_because: I realise that I am incredibly fortunate to have what I need and more, and that there are many, many people in the world who are not so fortunate - despite working incredibly hard. I also think this is a wonderful program - seeing such a small step make such a big difference. Surely we are on this planet to help each other - we are all in it together, and Kiva helps to make this a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a naturopath, which means I use natural medicine (herbs, vitamins and food) to help people who are sick.
